name: Escape If You Can
description:
Quick and easy, little game.
You have to escape in a given time and for this you have to find and switch switches and get over some impediments, for example poisonous liquid and drops and other moving dangers. The switches' places are changing from game to game, so you can play with game multiple times. The impediments can decrease your health and can kill you.
It's a bit mixture of a maze game and the first level is a little bit of platformer game.
(My first little game to get an overview about game development and release processes.)
